faqs.question: Is IGNOU OPENMAT still required for MBA admission at IGNOU?
faqs.answer: No, IGNOU OPENMAT has been discontinued after 2021. Admission to IGNOU MBA and related management programs is now based on direct application through the IGNOU admission portal.[4]
